node.contents: The ANR happens because I'm getting the data from the server then save it locally after saving it(Thread 1) i'm trying to get the saved data(Thread 2) that's why i made the method synchronized.

node.contents: ANR messages are shown when the UI thread is not responding more than 5 sec (varies with device). I think you're calling method from UI thread which is synchronised on the same object as the one on which you're calling insertNewObstacle method.

astNode.text: ANR messages are shown when the UI thread is not responding more than 5 sec (varies with device). I think you're calling method from UI thread which is synchronised on the same object as the one on which you're calling insertNewObstacle method.

node.contents: Also why are you using two separate threads for writing and reading ? Just use one AsyncTask which will fetch data from network and present data on UI thread in doInBackground.

astNode.text: Also why are you using two separate threads for writing and reading ? Just use one AsyncTask which will fetch data from network and present data on UI thread in doInBackground.

node.contents: synchronized method locks on the object itself. If another thread is holding that lock e.g. by running in some other synchronized method of the same object, your call will block until the lock is available.

astNode.text: synchronized method locks on the object itself. If another thread is holding that lock e.g. by running in some other synchronized method of the same object, your call will block until the lock is available.

node.contents: Blocking the main UI thread for 5 secods or more causes the ANR.

astNode.text: Blocking the main UI thread for 5 secods or more causes the ANR.

node.contents: Synchronization with sqlite is not necessary - the database will handle it own locking. However, an exclusive write transaction will prevent any other access with SQLITE_BUSY error.

astNode.text: Synchronization with sqlite is not necessary - the database will handle it own locking. However, an exclusive write transaction will prevent any other access with SQLITE_BUSY error.

node.contents: Generally, sqlite works best if only one thread is accessing it. You should rethink your design. If there's a long-running database operation that does not need to be atomic, split it into shorter parts.

astNode.text: Generally, sqlite works best if only one thread is accessing it. You should rethink your design. If there's a long-running database operation that does not need to be atomic, split it into shorter parts.

node.contents: ANR (Activity Not Responding) comes when ui tread wont receive any response for 5 seconds. Getting data from server the and saving it to data base can be done from background service with thread or only with service, why im suggesting background service so ui thread can run easily. And more over to load the data from the database i dont think u need async task.

astNode.text: ANR (Activity Not Responding) comes when ui tread wont receive any response for 5 seconds. Getting data from server the and saving it to data base can be done from background service with thread or only with service, why im suggesting background service so ui thread can run easily. And more over to load the data from the database i dont think u need async task.

node.contents: so ans is your using two async tasks, both are ui thread blocker and one dependent on other. so unless you data not get loaded from the server and saved into database, your one more loading data to ui async task has to wait. so ui thread has to wait, utill it load the data from server and data to the ui. Async task has got different use case dont use it here and tru to avoid synchronization block unnessasary.

astNode.text: so ans is your using two async tasks, both are ui thread blocker and one dependent on other. so unless you data not get loaded from the server and saved into database, your one more loading data to ui async task has to wait. so ui thread has to wait, utill it load the data from server and data to the ui. Async task has got different use case dont use it here and tru to avoid synchronization block unnessasary.
